long_description: Spy Frazier Sunglasses for men deliver the eye protection you need for all your outdoor sports. Gray-green polycarbonate lenses block 87% of visible light and 100% of harmful UV rays. Spy Happy lenses tone down brightness without distorting colors; great for driving and other activities where high contrast is needed. Grilamid frames are lightweight and impact-resistant. Spy Frazier Sunglasses have rubber nose and temple pads that stay on securely, even when wet. Lenses are injected in a unique tapered shape to provide optically correct, distortion-free viewing at all angles.
short_description: Spy Frazier Sunglasses for men deliver the eye protection you need for all your outdoor sports.
